Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/30th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kedzie, 26th, Central Park, 31st., due to, street blockage, near Kedzie/30th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Kedzie, 26th, Central Park, 31st., due to, street blockage, near Kedzie/30th.

Allow extra travel time.
